item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, March 28, 2025 at 6:25 PM UTC
item.description:

3. Xee: A Modern XPath and XSLT Engine in Rust (135 points | 62 comments)

10. How to Write Blog Posts That Developers Read · Refactoring English (167 points | 61 comments)
11. Cross-Platform P2P Wi-Fi: How the EU Killed AWDL (118 points | 61 comments)

13. Building Statically Linked Go Executables with CGO and Zig (47 points | 6 comments)

19. PermitFlow (YC W22) Is Hiring Senior/Staff Engineers in NYC ( | hide)
20. How to Use Em Dashes (–), En Dashes (–), and Hyphens (-) (550 points | 410 comments)
21. I asked police to send me their public surveillance footage of my car (401 points | 303 comments)
22. Tracing the thoughts of a large language model (909 points | 314 comments)
23. The Biology of B-Movie Monsters (2003) (33 points | 22 comments)

25. A note on the USB-to-PS/2 mouse adapter that came with Microsoft mouse devices (328 points | 102 comments)
26. Japanese scientists create new plastic that dissolves in saltwater overnight (86 points | 47 comments)
27. I tried making artificial sunlight at home (514 points | 215 comments)
28. Moiré Than Meets the Eye: Uncovering the Quantum Potential of Phasons (11 points | discuss)
29. Are Levi's from Amazon different from Levi's from Levi's? (94 points | 88 comments)
30. Entropy Attacks (67 points | 15 comments)
